Mauricio Verano Merino

  • About me

I am a PhD student in the Software Engineering and Technology group at TU/e and Software Analysis and Transformation group at CWI. My PhD project is funded by Canon.

My research interests are:

  • Software language engineering
  • DSLs
  • Humand-computer interaction
  • Sports and technology
  • Cloud computing

  • 2014
    Migrating JEE applications to a microservice-based architecture deployed in the cloud.
